dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents rivers for Portland Metro, Oregon in 2001. The dataset was originally published by the Metro Data Resource Center in February 2001.[River and waterbody data layer, which in addition to the major rivers and water bodies found in Metro's major rivers layer, includes: the Tualatin River and its tributaries, the Molalla and Pudding Rivers, Johnson Creek and others of approximately the same size.]
